response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me, but its true worth lies in its potential to enrich your life or business. Given its immense significance and the impact it could have on you, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair and generous offer considering its true market value of $1,000,000 and the benefits it will bring to you. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
